attributes.action: LIFE IN PRISON SHOULD MEAN A MINIMUM OF 30 YEARS NO PAROLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No more early releases for Murderers,
the sentence should be a minimum of 30
years to a full life term with no early release on any grounds.
If we cant have Capital Punishment then lets have a sentencing policy to keep killers in jail
